item.title: Enginering Projects
item.description: All of my personal projects can be found on GitHub, here are a few key repositories that I am proud of: ReactiveProblemSolving Reactive problem solving…. ProactiveProblemSolving Proactive problem solving….

item.title: Programming Projects
item.description: All of my personal projects can be found on GitHub. Below are some projects I am particularly proud of: ProjectEuler Project Euler is a collection of challenging math problems solved with programming. I have used these problems for intellectual stimulation and to practice coding in Java. Archives of the problems are here. Find the first triangular number that has at least 500 divisors Problem #12 <Find the first 10 digits of the sum of 100 fifty-digit numbers Problem #13 Find the number of paths through a 20 x 20 grid Problem #15 Find the sum of the digits in 2^1000 Problem #16 Total number of letters used to write out 1-1000 in words Problem #17 Find the sum of the digits in 100!
